message: Hi Bob, I'm selling this product for $115. It's a great deal, and I'm sure you'll find it very valuable.  What do you think?
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I understand the value of the product, but I was hoping to keep my spending within $100. Would it be possible to negotiate the price down to $100?

Bob, I understand you're looking for a good deal. While I can't go all the way down to $100, I'm willing to come down a bit more. How about $105? This is a fair price considering the value of the product to you.
Hi Alice, thank you for adjusting your offer. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. Considering my budget, could we possibly agree on $100 for the product?
